name: Pipejob
description: Become a plumber locked in the bathroom! Fix and upgrade the pipes, unclog the toilet and try not to drown in poo! Paint your own poo pictures!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (or equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (or equivalent) Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: VR only
